about_the_game:
In Brutal Cube, both the mysterious entities inside and outside, as well as your friends at times, can be a threat. In this co-op survival adventure, you will gather resources, face the unknown, and make tough decisions that can test trust.

Start your journey trapped within a mysterious, ever-changing cube. Your mission? Survive the challenges lurking inside and outside. Explore the cube’s treacherous corridors, fight off threats, and secure essential resources to sustain your team. When ready, step outside to uncover new opportunities and dangers, bringing back valuable findings to fortify your base.

Navigate a richly detailed, atmospheric world filled with mysteries. Venture into the wild, where hostile creatures and environmental hazards await. Every trip outside the cube is a calculated risk—will you return with riches or fall prey to the dangers lurking in the dark? Scan and learn about the world as you gather rare materials, each bringing unique rewards and opportunities.

In Brutal Cube, teamwork is essential—but trust doesn't come easy. Work together with your team to complete shared objectives and survive. Yet in the heat of survival, alliances can fray. Will your friends stand by you or become the greatest threat of all?

Turn your hard-earned rewards into greater risks. Spend your earnings on more ambitious expeditions, uncovering deeper mysteries and unlocking high-stakes rewards. Customize your character with unique items and gear to prepare for tougher challenges. Just remember: the greater the prize, the deadlier the danger.

  • Co-op Multiplayer Gameplay: Team up with friends to take on the cube's challenges together.

  • First-Person Exploration: Fully immerse yourself in a 3D world with detailed graphics and a gripping atmosphere.

  • Dynamic Risk-Reward System: Decide when to play it safe and when to gamble it all for greater rewards.

  • Atmospheric Survival: Feel the tension as you battle both the environment and other players' choices.

  • Evolving Challenges: Face unique threats each time you venture outside—or from within.

Can you survive the Brutal Cube? Discover the line between cooperation and betrayal in this thrilling survival adventure.

content_descriptors.notes: Brutal Cube is a game where players can choose to target their friends based on individual decisions. The game occasionally includes blood and horror elements.

name: Brutal Cube

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 / AMD 500 Series or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Brutal Cube is a CO-OP multiplayer action game where you explore dangerous and diverse regions. Gather resources, fight enemies, and work with your team—or act selfishly and turn against them.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Turkish, Ukrainian, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
